title: NOYITO Lead Acid Battery Tester 12V 24V 36V 48V 60V LCD Digital Battery Capacity Monitor Status Indicator Universal Car Vehicle Auto Electric Quantity Detector (24V Lead-Acid, Blue)
features: LCD battery capacity tester is suitable for 12V 24V 36V 48V lead acid battery
The battery tester owns a high quality and clear LCD display, super bright blue back-light, easy and convenient to check the battery status.
Two wire simple wiring (Red wire: Battery +; Black wire: Battery -; White plug: the interface of the monitor (please pay attention to the direction of the interface).
Application: Can be applied to Various instruments and meters; portable device; power bank; medical device, electrombile, self-balance car.
NOYITO DC Battery Meter Battery Tester Instruction user manual https://1drv.ms/b/s!AlzQUCOyZQhKgQE_XuNH53Uebs6W?e=785gjd
description: Technical Parameters:  Operating current: <5mA; Operating voltage:12V 24V 36V 48V; Operating temperature: 0℃-40℃; Backlight: Blue; Applicable battery specification: Lead-acid battery 12V, 24V, 36V, 48V;  Application: Various instruments and meters; portable device; power bank; medical device, electrombile, self-balance car.  Battery Specification Adjusting Method: Under the condition of power off, long-press the button on the back of the module (do not release) and power up the module. The monitor will display the battery specification, then press the button again to choose the battery specification. After choosing the specification you need, cut off the power and then power up the module again. The adjustment is finished.  Wiring Method: Red wire: Battery +; Black wire: Battery - ; White plug: the interface of the monitor (please pay attention to the direction of the interface)   Warm Tips： The tester cannot be exposed to direct-sun for a long term or be used in lower-20℃ or higher 60℃, which will reduce the service life of the tester.   Package Included:  1*Battery Capacity Tester  1*Lead Wire 1*User Manual
